item.title: Ios 4
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:9, topic:351187”][quote author=hawkgames link=topic=447545.msg3285856#msg3285856 date=1280194781]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=447545.msg3285189#msg3285189 date=1280163011]

[quote author=hawkgames link=topic=447545.msg3284647#msg3284647 date=1280113865]
If anyone has a ipod touch like me did you notice that ios 4 is crap?
[/quote]Uhm, how is it crap? I mean, I have it on my iPod touch and I see major difference. I do anticipate a disappointment when I get my iPhone 4 though.
[/quote]ios stole most my battery time for ipod
[/quote]I was wondering why my battery wasn’t lasting as long as usual :/[/quote]

Oh fuck me I thought the battery was just losing it’s life.
